00033 typedef struct STK_Slidebar {
00034         STK_Widget widget;
00035         Uint32 orientation;     // horizontal or vertical
00036 
00037         Uint32 b_width;         // button width
00038         Uint32 b_height;        // button height
00039         
00040         int state;              // store the state of the slidebar
00041         int changed;            // represent whether the state of the slidebar has been changed
00042         int r_x;                // relative x distance between mouse and button left top corner
00043         int r_y;                // relative y distance between mouse and button left top corner
00044         
00045         Uint32 maxvalue;        // Unit: percentage
00046         Uint32 minvalue;        // Unit: percentage
00047         Uint32 curvalue;        // Unit: percentage
00048         Uint32 step;            // percentage
00049         
00050         float maxpixel;         // Unit: pixel
00051         float minpixel;         // Unit: pixel
00052         float curpixel;         // Unit: pixel
00053         float pixelstep;        // pixels on screen, should be accurate, otherwise will introduce in big residuals.
00054         
00055         Uint32 value_locked;
00056 } STK_Slidebar;
